Public.bio: The guest is a former NBA point guard with a 15-year career, including two championships and three All-Star selections. Since retiring four years ago, they've become a successful business owner with a chain of basketball training facilities and founded a youth development program. They're known for being outspoken about player mental health and development, while also providing insightful analysis of the modern game.
